{{ contact?.name }}

 import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Contact } from '../contact.model'; @Component({ selector: 'cms-contact-item', templateUrl: './contact-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-item.component.css'], }) export class ContactItemComponent implements OnInit { @Input() contact: Contact; constructor() {} ngOnInit() {} }
